pr_title: feat: Adding support for STACKED_AREA in Visualization [DHIS2-9218]

timeline.message: feat: Adding support for STACKED_AREA in Visualization [DHIS2-9218]
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/dhis2/dhis2-core into DHIS2-9218

timeline.bodyText: Do we need "trim" here? Just wondering since we have an enum for type so there should not be any invalid values in that column.
timeline.author: larshelge
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,4 @@
+
+-- Rename all AREA type to STACKED_AREA, in the "visualization" table.
+
+UPDATE visualization SET "type"='STACKED_AREA' WHERE trim("type")='AREA';

replies.bodyText: That's right, it was just my sense of avoiding any issues during migration. But of course, it can be removed. Will push soon.
replies.author: maikelarabori

timeline.message: fix: Removing trim function from migration [DHIS2-9218]
